text: The 2005–06 Tampa Bay Lightning season was the 14th National Hockey League season in Tampa, Florida. The Lightning hoped to defend their Stanley Cup championship, which they won in 2003–04. ==Regular season== ===Final standings=== ===Game log=== {| class="wikitable" width="70%" |- ! width="2%" | No.
